title: Inbound tourism in Qatar from 2013 to 2022
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of arrivals in millions. In total the number of data points it has is 10.
Overall Number of arrivals in millions has increased over the Year.
Number of arrivals in millions is slightly increasing from 2013 to 2022.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2021 and 2022.
Maximum Number of arrivals in millions, about 3.7 was reported at Year 2022
The lowest Number of arrivals in millions, of value 1.0 was reported at Year 2013
